caption.p: Effect of LiCl and DG on different stages of the PDCoV replication cycle. ( A). The levels of vRNA in cells treated with 60 mM LiCl during viral attachment and entry were determined by real-time qPCR. ( B) Same experiment as in A but using DG at 1250 μg/mL. Values represent the mean ± SD of three independent experiments; ns, no significant difference; * p < 0.05; ** p < 0.01; *** p < 0.001.
